name: Aviere
description: The Aviere is a tiny celestial creature that serves as a protector and healer, embodying the virtues of good and light. It has a delicate appearance, enhanced by its ability to emit bright light.
memorable: The Aviere's Divine Rejuvenation ability allows it to return to life after death, making it exceptionally resilient in encounters.
goals: To assist and heal allies while upholding the virtues of good.
relations: Often found alongside other celestial beings or good-aligned creatures.
environment: Typically found near holy sites or places where good is upheld.
strengths: Resistance to radiant damage and immunity to fire and poison, along with its magical attacks and healing abilities.
weaknesses: Low strength and physical durability mean it is less effective in direct combat situations.
attacks: Claw attack that deals slashing and fire damage, focusing on magical properties.
most_powerful_ability: Divine Rejuvenation allows the Aviere to potentially come back to life after death.
skills: Excels in performance with a +6 modifier, reflecting its high Charisma.
additional_information: Sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
Gains advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects due to Magic Resistance.
Its weapon attacks are considered magical, bypassing certain resistances.
Can stabilize allies with its Song of Life ability.
Can heal allies with its Song of Healing ability once a day.
